m_szDocTitle: Telepresence robot with a camera boom - Intouch Technologies, Inc.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Telepresence robot with a camera boom United States Patent 8996165 Abstract: A remote controlled robot with a head that supports a monitor and is coupled to a mobile platform. The mobile robot also includes an auxiliary camera coupled to the mobile platform by a boom. The mobile robot is controlled by a remote control station. By way of example, the robot can be remotely moved about an operating room. The auxiliary camera extends from the boom so that it provides a relatively close view of a patient or other item in the room. An assistant in the operating room
